job.name: MySQL
job.description: Deployment of the MySQL Database server. This workflow requires the following third-party credential: {key: mysql://<mysql_username>@<mysql_instance_name>, value: FTP_PASSWORD}. Please refer to the User documentation to learn how to add third-party credentials.

task.name: Start_MySQL
task.description: Pull MySQL image and start a container

script.code:
printf "Pulling mysql image \n" docker pull activeeon/mysql
if [ ! -z "$variables_MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME_CL" ]; then CONTAINER=$variables_MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME_CL else CONTAINER=$variables_MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME fi
if [ ! -z "$variables_MYSQL_DATABASE_CL" ]; then MYSQL_DATABASE=$variables_MYSQL_DATABASE_CL else MYSQL_DATABASE=$variables_MYSQL_DATABASE fi
if [ ! -z "$variables_MYSQL_USER_CL" ]; then MYSQL_USER=$variables_MYSQL_USER_CL else MYSQL_USER=$variables_MYSQL_USER fi
if [ ! -z "$variables_MYSQL_PASSWORD_CL" ]; then MYSQL_PASSWORD=$variables_MYSQL_PASSWORD_CL else MYSQL_PASSWORD=$variables_MYSQL_PASSWORD fi
echo MYSQL_INSTANCE_NAME = "$CONTAINER" echo MYSQL_DATABASE = "$MYSQL_DATABASE" echo MYSQL_USER = "$MYSQL_USER" echo MYSQL_PASSWORD = "$MYSQL_PASSWORD"
# Check whether MYSQL_USER and MYSQL_PASSWORD have been well entered if [ \( ! -z "$MYSQL_USER" -a -z "$MYSQL_PASSWORD" \) -o \( -z "$MYSQL_USER" -a ! -z "$MYSQL_PASSWORD" \) ]; then echo ERROR: MYSQL_USER and MYSQL_PASSWORD should be either both entered or both blank. exit 1 fi
if [ -z "$credentials_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD" ]; then echo ERROR: Please add your MySQL root password to 3rd-party credentials under the key MYSQL\_ROOT\_PASSWORD exit 1 fi
if [ "$(docker ps -a | grep $CONTAINER)" ]; then RUNNING=$(docker inspect --format="{{ .State.Running }}" $CONTAINER 2> /dev/null) STOPPED=$(docker inspect --format="{{ .State.Status }}" $CONTAINER 2> /dev/null)
if [ "$RUNNING" == "true" ]; then echo "$CONTAINER container is running" elif [ "$STOPPED" == "exited" ]; then echo "Starting $CONTAINER container" docker start $CONTAINER fi
else echo "Running $CONTAINER container" if [ "$MYSQL_DATABASE" == null ] && [ "$MYSQL_USER" == null ]; then docker run --name $CONTAINER -p 3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=$credentials_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -d activeeon/mysql elif [ "$MYSQL_DATABASE" == null ] && [ "$MYSQL_USER" != null ]; then docker run --name $CONTAINER -p 3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=$credentials_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e MYSQL_USER=$MYSQL_USER -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=$MYSQL_PASSWORD -d activeeon/mysql elif [ "$MYSQL_DATABASE" != null ] && [ "$MYSQL_USER" == null ]; then docker run --name $CONTAINER -p 3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=$credentials_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e MYSQL_DATABASE=$MYSQL_DATABASE -d activeeon/mysql else docker run --name $CONTAINER -p 3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=$credentials_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD -e MYSQL_USER=$MYSQL_USER -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=$MYSQL_PASSWORD -e MYSQL_DATABASE=$MYSQL_DATABASE -d activeeon/mysql fi
fi
port=$(docker inspect --format='{{(index (index .NetworkSettings.Ports "3306/tcp") 0).HostPort}}' $CONTAINER) echo "$port" > $CONTAINER"_port"
# Endpoint added to the job variables using a groovy post-script
